name: Where The Cloud Lives
description:
"Where the Cloud Lives" is a game I made in 48 hours for Ludum Date 42 with the theme "running out of space". 

You control the freshly hired supervisor of a new division in an established tech company: Cloud storage.  Their motto is: "You never run out of space"... We'll see how that goes. There are two endings.

You can pan the screen with the WASD keys or Alt-Click. Spacebar will advance textboxes. All other controls are explained in game... I think.

Thanks for checking this out! I really enjoyed putting it together.
